import React from 'react' import { useGlobalContext } from '../context' const SearchForm = () => { const { nftInput, setNftInput, searchPressed, setSearchPressed } = useGlobalContext() setSearchPressed(false) const handleChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setNftInput(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setSearchPressed(true) } return (
) } export default SearchForm
